GeneralError.Message: A general error has occurred. See Resolution for details.
GeneralError.Resolution: Retry the operation; if the problem persists, contact the service provider.

ResourceNotFound.Description: The requested resource was not found.
ResourceNotFound.Resolution: Provide a valid resource identifier and resubmit the request.

MethodNotAllowed.Description: The operation is not supported on the target resource.
MethodNotAllowed.Message: The HTTP method is not allowed on the target resource.
MethodNotAllowed.Resolution: Use an allowed HTTP method for the target resource and resubmit the request.

Unauthorized.Description: Authentication has failed or credentials were not provided.
Unauthorized.Message: The request could not be authorized.
Unauthorized.Resolution: Provide valid credentials and resubmit the request.

InsufficientPrivilege.Description: The requester does not have the required privileges.
InsufficientPrivilege.Message: The request failed because the requester does not have the necessary privileges.
InsufficientPrivilege.Resolution: Resubmit the request using an account with the required privileges.
